column4: http://pastebin.com/m3c7e1e77 hello, i have apache server, but it's problem with 80 port, i forwarded the port in my router. but it still doesn't work. can anyone check if the 80 is successfully working?
and what happens when you do telnet <<boxip>> 80 from another machine (same network)
i don't know. but other ports works. as u can see, 82, 8080. they works fine.
the only problem is with 80 port.
apache is listening on 80, 82 and 8080 port
so whats your domain? as well, check httpd.conf and ensure that Listen is set to the correct ip.
i didn't set ip. Just, Listen 80, Listen 82, Listen 8080
i forwarded all the ports to my local machine.
using what util did you do your port forwarding?
